GIANLUCA VENTURINI

ABOUT ME

I'm an italian student coming from Politecnico di Milano where I'm studying Engineering of Computing Systems. In this semester I'm working on my Master Thesis in Human Computer Interaction and I'm taking User Interface Design and Programming course in order to improve my skills in user interface design.
